unnormalised: Real Estate Jitters? Rental Agreements ka Tension, Gone!
normalised: Real Estate Jitters? Rental Agreements ka Tension, Gone!

unnormalised: Mumbai: Finding that perfect chawl or swanky flat in Bandra is hard enough, but the rental agreement? Total headache, right? But chill, things are getting easier!
normalised: Mumbai: Finding that perfect chawl or swanky flat in Bandra is hard enough, but the rental agreement? Total headache, right? But chill, things are getting easier!

unnormalised: Propertywala.com reports a 30% surge in online rental agreement registrations this quarter. Forget those endless trips to the lawyer's office and shelling out big bucks. Now you can do it all from your phone!
normalised: Propertywala dot com reports a thirty percent surge in online rental agreement registrations this quarter. Forget those endless trips to the lawyer's office and shelling out big bucks. Now you can do it all from your phone!

unnormalised: Think of it as your very own digital stamp paper. Plus, several startups are offering door-to-door service for document verification.
normalised: Think of it as your very own digital stamp paper. Plus, several startups are offering door-to-door service for document verification.

unnormalised: Remember that scene in "Gully Boy" where Murad struggles with his landlord? Hopefully, with these new systems, fewer folks will face that kinda stress.
normalised: Remember that scene in "Gully Boy" where Murad struggles with his landlord? Hopefully, with these new systems, fewer folks will face that kinda stress.

unnormalised: Even ICICI Bank is jumping on the bandwagon, offering integrated rental agreement services through their app. Seems like everyone's trying to simplify the 'kiraya' process.
normalised: Even I C I C I Bank is jumping on the bandwagon, offering integrated rental agreement services through their app. Seems like everyone's trying to simplify the 'kiraya' process.

unnormalised: So, breathe easy, future tenants of India. Signing your rental agreement shouldn't feel like climbing Mount Everest anymore. Just remember your Aadhaar card!
normalised: So, breathe easy, future tenants of India. Signing your rental agreement shouldn't feel like climbing Mount Everest anymore. Just remember your Aadhaar card!
